Life.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
Life.author: Dalai Lama

Life.quote: Life is what happens when you’re busy making other plans.
Life.author: John Lennon

Life.quote: In the end, we only regret the chances we didn’t take.
Life.author: Lewis Carroll

Life.quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one’s courage.
Life.author: Anaïs Nin

Life.quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.
Life.author: Socrates

Motivation.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
Motivation.author: Arthur Ashe

Motivation.quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
Motivation.author: Nelson Mandela

Motivation.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
Motivation.author: Walt Disney

Motivation.quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
Motivation.author: Sam Levenson

Motivation.quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
Motivation.author: Pablo Picasso

Success.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
Success.author: Henry David Thoreau

Success.quote: Success is not final; failure is not fatal.
Success.author: Winston Churchill

Success.quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
Success.author: John D. Rockefeller

Success.quote: The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.
Success.author: John D. Rockefeller Jr.

Success.quote: Opportunities don’t happen. You create them.
Success.author: Chris Grosser

Wisdom.quote: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
Wisdom.author: Aristotle

Wisdom.quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
Wisdom.author: Socrates

Love.quote: Where there is love, there is life.
Love.author: Mahatma Gandhi

Love.quote: We accept the love we think we deserve.
Love.author: Stephen Chbosky

Love.quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
Love.author: David Viscott

Love.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
Love.author: Aristotle

Courage.quote: Courage is not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it.
Courage.author: Nelson Mandela

Courage.quote: You gain strength, courage, and confidence every time you stop to look fear in the face.
Courage.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

Courage.quote: Leap, and the net will appear.
Courage.author: John Burroughs

Courage.quote: Do the thing you fear, and the death of fear is certain.
Courage.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Leadership.quote: A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way.
Leadership.author: John C. Maxwell

Leadership.quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
Leadership.author: Steve Jobs

Leadership.quote: The greatest leader is the one who gets people to do the greatest things.
Leadership.author: Ronald Reagan

Leadership.quote: Leadership is the capacity to translate vision into reality.
Leadership.author: Warren Bennis

Leadership.quote: A genuine leader is not a searcher for consensus but a molder of consensus.
Leadership.author: Martin Luther King Jr.
